name: John
comment: Excuse me, may I ask you a question?

name: John
comment: I'd like to go to clothing store in 3rd Avenue, but I'm lost. How can I go there from here?

name: Tom
comment: First, go along the street until you see the big park on your left. Then, if you turn right at the intersection near the park and go straight ahead, you will arrive.

name: John
comment: Thank you very much. How long does it take to go to the clothes shop by walking from here?

name: Tom
comment: It takes more than 30 minutes to walk, so if you are in a hurry you should go by taxi. You can get there in 13 minutes by taxi.

name: John
comment: Understood. Thank you. I think that I will stop walking to my destination and take a taxi.
